thread.title: Luca
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Luca

author: Luca
title: Luca
text:
Nothing to declare about the service and about the very competitive prices. I bought a Barbour jacket: perfect model, perfect size.
However, despite it was inside its bag, was full of dust and lint.
It has been very difficult to make them go away and it's still not entirely clean.
